articles.author: Kevin Buckland
articles.title: Most Asia stock markets slide, oil advances on Middle East risks - Reuters
articles.description: Most Asian stock markets sank on Wednesday, catching up with the sell-off on Wall Street after Iran's ballistic missile strike on Israel provoked fears of a wider regional conflict, while crude oil pushed higher on the risk of supply disruptions.

articles.title: Oil prices jump more than $1 as Middle East tensions escalate - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices jumped by over a dollar on Wednesday due to rising concerns Middle East tensions could escalate, potentially disrupting crude output from the region, following Iran's biggest ever military blow against Israel.

articles.title: Oracle to invest $6.5 billion to set up cloud facilities in Malaysia - Reuters
articles.description: Oracle plans to invest more than $6.5 billion to set up its first public cloud region in Malaysia, the company said on Wednesday, the latest major investment by a global tech firm into the Southeast Asian country.
